string.name: movePieceFromE2ToE4
string.comment:
movePieceFromE2ToE4
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Pomaknite figuru s e2 na e4

string.name: moveKnightToC3
string.comment:
moveKnightToC3
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

string.name: dropARookAtB4
string.comment:
dropARookAtB4
Note: Coordinates (a-g in Latin characters) currently remain the same regardless of which language the user has selected.

resources.string: Spustite topa na b4 (samo u Crazyhouseu)

string.name: readOutOpponentName
string.comment:
readOutOpponentName
Press a button on the keyboard to hear the opponent's name aloud. The feature is most useful for blind players.

resources.string: Ako Vam je zapis poteza iznad nepoznat, naučite više ovdje:
Dodavanje \"x\" za označavanje uzimanja nije obavezno

string.name: bothTheLetterOAndTheDigitZero
string.comment:
bothTheLetterOAndTheDigitZero
Only the Latin character 'o' works.

resources.string: I slovo \"o\" i cifra \"0\" mogu se koristiti za rokadu
Ako su moguće obje rokade, pritisnite Enter za malu
Velika i mala slova bitna su samo u višeznačnim situacijama s lovcem i b-pješakom
Da odigrate pretpotez, samo ukucajte željeni pretpotez prije Vašeg reda za igru
